liber.edit.client
Class ResourceTypeElicitor

java.lang.Object
  PopupPanel
      liber.edit.client.ResourceTypeElicitor

public class ResourceTypeElicitor
extends PopupPanel

Shows the user the types of resource that he can deposit, and asks him to specify what he is depositing.

Version:
1.2 October 2007
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Initialises the editing session with the selected item. Generates and displays a form that elicits compulsory information about the new object.

showTagCloud

public void showTagCloud(TagCloud cloud)
Shows a tag cloud with the most frequent tags used for the various properties in a form. This tag cloud is non-clickable, as we don't know what tags are meant for which boxes! Users will just have to copy paste.

Parameters:
cloud - TagCloud

showForm

public void showForm(FormInfo[] info,
                     String nl,
                     String type)
Shows a form with which the cardinal properties can be added quickly.

Parameters:
info - Information about form
nl - NL-expression of class
type - Class name

onClick

public void onClick(Widget sender)
Click listener on buttons. If help, display help diagram; if ok, display 'confirm choice' pop-up or generate form.

Parameters:
sender - Button Widget
